title: LuJoSoft ComicReader
description:
LuJoSoft ComicReader

New project a cbr and cbz comic reader, will be ready for testing this weekend.
Feature

Scan directory for all cbr and cbz.
Ability to rotate, zoom in and out, to pan and fit to screen.
You can use the arrow key to change page.
Ability to save the book to pdf.
Much more to come.

Please give feedback in this thread http://www.lujosoft.net/Forum1/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=546

What are the image format usually use in the cbr and cbz?
What other function is missing or could be useful ?

Note this is a project in development 

Coming soon thumbnail instead of page name

Install instruction
Just double click the setup and your done
